price: 16. Iyagoo qaadan waxa uu Rabbigood siiyey. Waxay ahaayeen horay sama falayaal.
arabic: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ākhidhīna mā ātāhum rabbuhum innahum kānū qabla dhālika muḥ'sinīna
